name: Grubroids
description:
Blast the rocks! Grab the grub!
Beat the bosses! Burg!

CONTROLS:

WASD/ARROW KEYS = Rotate ship/thrusters
SPACEBAR = Shoot
F = Toggle fullscreen/windowed
M = Toggle mute
ESC = Quit

RULES:
Shoot the rocks to release the delicious grub within.
Collect the grub to increase your multiplier and score.
Certain ships drop weapon and shield power-ups.
Collect up to three of the same weapon type to power it up respectively.
Boss wave every five stages.
There's probably other stuff too I don't know. *cough*debug/cheat mode*cough*

BUGS:
Sprites flicker erratically whenever the player dies. Not game breaking. Seems to be a conversion bug from porting it to GMS2 from v1.4
